articles.author: https://www.engadget.com/about/editors/mat-smith
articles.title: The Morning After: Will we see Apple's mixed-reality headset at WWDC 2023? - Engadget
articles.description:
The biggest news stories this morning: 
Lamborghini's plug-in hybrid supercar runs for only six miles in electric mode, Tech leaders and AI experts demand a six-month pause on 'out-of-control' AI experiments, Will we see Apple's mixed-reality headset at WWDC …
articles.content: Apple has set the dates for WWDC 2023, which will run between June 5th and June 9th. It's still an online-only affair, but there will be a "special experience" at Apple Park on the 5th for developers… [+3748 chars]

articles.title: Gravity's Cosmic Spotlight: Unveiling a Monstrous 30-Billion-Solar-Mass Black Hole Through Light-Bending Phenomenon - SciTechDaily
articles.description: A team of astronomers has discovered one of the biggest black holes ever found, taking advantage of a phenomenon called gravitational lensing. Light-bending gravity The team, led by Durham University, UK, used gravitational lensing – where a foreground galaxy…
articles.content:
ByDurham UniversityMarch 30, 2023
Astronomers led by Durham University have discovered one of the largest black holes ever found, with a mass over 30 billion times that of the Sun, by utilizing grav… [+6662 chars]

articles.author: Amit Malewar
articles.title: Chandra determined what causes a galaxy’s wind to blow - Tech Explorist
articles.description: Study the effects of powerful winds launched from the center of a nearby galaxy, NGC 253.
articles.content: Starburst galaxies are characterized by their prominent multiphase outflows known as galactic winds. These galactic winds have essential effects on their host galaxies, where they alter the metal con… [+4073 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Microsoft introduces AI-powered cybersecurity assistant - HT Tech
articles.description: The Microsoft tool, named 'Security Copilot', is a simple prompt box that will help security analysts with tasks like summarizing incidents, analyzing vulnerabilities and sharing information with co-workers on a pinboard.
articles.content: Microsoft Corp on Tuesday launched a tool to help cybersecurity professionals identify breaches, threat signals and better analyze data, using OpenAI's latest GPT-4 generative artificial intelligence… [+799 chars]

articles.title: EU agrees to exempt e-fuels from 2035 | WION Climate Tracker - WION
articles.description: In a revolutionary decision the European union has banned new sales of combustion-engine cars from 2035. @rohitwellington brings you the report.#climatechang...
